snippet.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 03 - Narrated Trailer
snippet.description:
The Rivals have been pushed back for the moment, but only just in time for a brand new threat to rear its ugly head. An insidious lithophage, a sickness of the very rock beneath our feet, has struck Hoxxes. 

Nicknamed the ROCKPOX, this planetary pathogen is spreading through the caves, infecting the rock and even directly affecting the local fauna. Even the hardy Dwarves can feel its insidious grasp.

Prepare for PLAGUEFALL!

Coming November 3rd, 2022 to Steam. 
Coming November 17th, 2022 to consoles and Windows Store.

--------------------

DEEP ROCK GALACTIC is a co-op-first sci-fi FPS featuring badass space Dwarves, 100% destructible environments, procedurally-generated caves, and endless hordes of alien monsters.

--------------------

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/548430
Microsoft Store: https://www.microsoft.com/store/productId/9NHFVWX1V7QJ
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/233449/

--------------------

Find out more:
http://www.deeprockgalactic.com/
https://deeprockgalactic.wiki.gg/wiki/Deep_Rock_Galactic_Wiki
http://ghostship.dk/

Follow Deep Rock Galactic:
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/DeepRockGalactic
Discord:  https://www.discord.gg/drg
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/joindeeprock/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/joindeeprock/
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/ghostship_games
